titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons, on Wednesday the 11th of December, 1695 being a solemn day of fasting and humiliation, appointed by His Majesty, for imploring the blessing of Almighty God upon the consultations of this present Parliament / by John Williams ...
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ri. Chiswell, and Tho. Cockerill ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
